Name: Another Farm Roguelike
About the game: Another Farm Roguelike is a 2D farming & crafting game with rougelike elements where your job is to earn as much money as possible to pay the rent. Grow crops Build different buildings to get the most value Create tools to make your work easier Recycle your resources to make them more valuable Gather a variety of resources Choose your upgrades wisely Start from scratch and build the most profitable farm you can make as soon as possible. Work hard to be able to afford the rent.
